concept.title: Software domain elements
concept.shortdesc: The elements in the software domain each have a specific semantic purpose.

conbody.p: Below are the software domain elements, their semantic purposes, and an example for each.

dlentry.dd:
message phrase
Double-click Setup.exe to begin the installation process.

message block
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

message number
401: Unauthorized Access.You don't have permission to access this resource.

command name
To compile the source code, use the javac following by the name of the Java source file.

variable (to be provided by user) name
Use md command following the directory name to create a new directory.

file name or path, or URI
Uncompress the gbbrsh.gz file to the /usr directory.

user input
Instructions to install a software:
Open the terminal window.
Type the following command: sudo apt-get install software-name.
Press Enter to execute the command.
Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

system output
To access the "sri" directory in the root directory, first type the command cd... Use this command until you see this path: C:\Users> (Root directory). Then, type the command cd sri, and hit Enter key. The system takes you to the directory: C:\Users\sri>.
